text: Did you know? The Earth is closer to the sun in winter than in summer. Mind blown. 🌍❄️
explanation: True! Earth's seasons are caused by the tilt of its axis, not its distance from the sun.

text: If the sun disappeared, we wouldn’t know for 8 minutes. ☀️🕗
explanation: Correct. Light from the sun takes about 8 minutes and 20 seconds to reach Earth.

text: There's a species of jellyfish that can essentially live forever. Immortality is real. 🔁🐡
explanation: Yes! *Turritopsis dohrnii* can revert to an earlier life stage, potentially repeating the cycle indefinitely.

text: Water conducts electricity, that’s why it’s dangerous. 💧⚡
explanation: Pure water doesn’t conduct electricity well. It’s the impurities (like salts) that make it conductive.

text: Humans only use 10% of their brains. Imagine the potential! 🧠💥
explanation: False. Brain imaging shows we use virtually every part of our brain.

text: Bananas are naturally radioactive 🍌⚛️
explanation: Bananas contain potassium-40, a naturally occurring isotope that makes them slightly radioactive.

text: There's a species of jellyfish that can essentially live forever. Immortality is real. 🔁🐡
explanation: Yes! *Turritopsis dohrnii* can revert to an earlier life stage, potentially repeating the cycle indefinitely.

text: Water conducts electricity, that’s why it’s dangerous. 💧⚡
explanation: Pure water doesn’t conduct electricity well. It’s the impurities (like salts) that make it conductive.

text: Water conducts electricity, that’s why it’s dangerous. 💧⚡
explanation: Pure water doesn’t conduct electricity well. It’s the impurities (like salts) that make it conductive.

text: Sharks never get cancer. Big Pharma doesn’t want you to know this. 🦈😤
explanation: False. Sharks can and do get cancer. This myth was popularized by a misleading book.

text: Sharks never get cancer. Big Pharma doesn’t want you to know this. 🦈😤
explanation: False. Sharks can and do get cancer. This myth was popularized by a misleading book.

text: The Great Wall of China is the only man-made object visible from space. 🛰️🇨🇳
explanation: Not true. Many human structures are visible from space, and the Great Wall often isn’t, due to its narrow width and color.

text: If you drop a penny from the Empire State Building, it could kill someone. 🪙☠️
explanation: A myth! A penny is too small and flat; air resistance slows it down too much to be lethal.

text: Did you know? The Earth is closer to the sun in winter than in summer. Mind blown. 🌍❄️
explanation: True! Earth's seasons are caused by the tilt of its axis, not its distance from the sun.

text: Humans only use 10% of their brains. Imagine the potential! 🧠💥
explanation: False. Brain imaging shows we use virtually every part of our brain.

text: Humans only use 10% of their brains. Imagine the potential! 🧠💥
explanation: False. Brain imaging shows we use virtually every part of our brain.

text: The human body literally glows in the dark—but our eyes can’t see it. ✨🧍
explanation: This is true! Humans emit small amounts of bioluminescence, but it’s a thousand times too weak to be visible.

text: Microwaving food destroys all the nutrients. Just eat raw. 🍲💀
explanation: Nope! Microwaving can actually preserve nutrients better than boiling or frying.

text: There's a species of jellyfish that can essentially live forever. Immortality is real. 🔁🐡
explanation: Yes! *Turritopsis dohrnii* can revert to an earlier life stage, potentially repeating the cycle indefinitely.

text: Humans only use 10% of their brains. Imagine the potential! 🧠💥
explanation: False. Brain imaging shows we use virtually every part of our brain.

text: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood. Nature is wild. 🐙💙
explanation: True! Two hearts pump blood to the gills, and one to the body. Their copper-based blood is blue.
